long_description: The REI Wheely Beast 28 provides you with a convenient way to carry exactly the gear you'll need. It offers ample capacity, easy loading and a durable, dependable handle and wheel system. Main pocket features a panel opening zipper for easy access to contents. Internal mesh zip pocket separates items from those in the main pocket. Rugged wheels roll smoothly and quietly as you dash through the airport terminal and navigate your way to the hotel lobby. Telescoping handle lets you pull the duffel with ease and control; locks into up/down position and has soft-touch handle grip. Top and side grab handles ease hauling. Separate top zippered pocket with "floating" lining allows for variations in packing options. ID window is safely secured underneath the REI Wheely Beast duffel's top flap. Exterior side zipper pocket gives you quick access to small items. Interior frame provides structure and upright stability for transport ease. Main compartment zipper can be secured with a standard travel lock, sold separately.
short_description: The REI Wheely Beast 28 provides you with a convenient way to carry exactly the gear you'll need. It offers ample capacity, easy loading and a durable, dependable handle and wheel system.
